name: João Alexandre Leite
content: Joao Leite's Homepage About JoÃ£o Leite is Professor of Computer Science at the Department of Computer Science, NOVA School of Science and Technology, NOVA University Lisbon. He obtained his PhD in Computer Science from NOVA University Lisbon in 2002. Before that, he obtained a MSc in Computer Science from NOVA University Lisbon in 1997 and graduated in Electronic Engineering from the University of Coimbra in 1994.His primary research interests include: Artificial Intelligence Knowledge Representation and Reasoning Neuro-symbolic Artificial Intelligence Answer-Set Programming Argumentation Theory Multi-Agent Systems Current Appointments: Head of Department, Department of Computer Science, FCT-NOVA Vice President of APPIA Principal Investigator of the Intelligent Systems Group at NOVA LINCS Member of the Scientific Council of FCT-NOVA Senior Visiting Fellow at CSE, UNSW, Sydney, Australia International Partner of Potassco Solutions Member of IFIP TC-12 Artificial Intelligence Profiles: DBLP Google Scholar ORCID Research Publications He authored and co-edited several books and journal special issues, and co-authored several papers. Projects He led and participated in several research projects and several scientific networks. Software He developed or coordinated the development of several software. Events He organised several scientific events, and participated in a large number of program committees. Publications Books and Journal Special Issues J. A.
